title: Nutrition Program Coordinator
status: Full Time, 40 hours per week (239 day calendar)Minimum Requirements:A minimum of a Bachelor’s Degreewithone of the following:an academic major in specific areas of concentration such as food and nutrition, food service management, dietetics, family and consumer sciences, nutrition education, culinary arts, business, or a related field;ORa state recognized certificate for school nutrition directors;ORa minimum of five years’ experience in management of school nutrition programs.A minimum of eight hours of food safety training is required to be completed within 30 days of start date and no more than five years old if completed prior to start date.CERTIFICATES, LICENSES, REGISTRATIONSMust have and maintain an active Utah Driver’s License.The salary for this position is assigned to lane 2 of the AA Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkAA Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):Nutrition Program Coordinator.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version
